document_data.name: Tathla Nightstar
document_data.mainbody: '''Tathla "Flamehair" Nightstar''' was a famous [[Courtesan (prostitute)|courtesan]] of [[Calimport]] and later proprietor of the [[Purple Palace]] [[festhall]] in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the mid-to-late 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.History:
She became famous as a courtesan in Calimport in [[Calimshan]] in the mid-1330s [[DR]]. At one point, she was also an [[adventurer]], but later retired from that life.

By the mid-1360s DR, Flamehair Nightstar was owner of the Purple Palace and was considered one of the shrewdest investors in the city at the time. She was also a friend to goodhearted adventurers.
document_data.Description: Even thirty years later, Tathla was considered a great beauty. She was nicknamed "Flamehair" for her blood-red hair, which was so long it enveloped her like a cloak and trailed over the ground behind her.
